lore: If an intelligent creature attracts the attention of the Auditors, but is not invited to the organization, it is likely they will be injected with a mysterious substance at some point in their life.\n\nThe tasks a Living Arbiter performs are somewhat different from those of other individuals of its species. It is usually found in the field, where research of all kinds is carried out, advising and resolving conflicts between researchers in its own way. Of course, anyone who tries to steal or destroy a scientific project will have to deal with this creature.
menagerieDialog: (Some sort of sorcery has replaced where its limbs once were. Quite unsettling.)
(Though this creature lacks a normal visage, you can't help but feel as though it's judging your every action.)
(The swirling and whirling of the magical energy encompassing this creature's body is a captivating spectacle, to say the least.)
(This creature moves with the grace and regality of a nobleman.)
(Though this creature often speaks to you, you're unable to discern what it says. Its words are drowned out by an exaggerated echo that causes its intonation to be all but lost.)
name: Living Arbiter
